data.name: The Music of Lost Legend (Original Video Game Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
From the composer:
At about 12 years old, I started playing the saxophone in my local middle-school band as part of their ‘Beginning Band’ program. Shortly after, I became fascinated with the idea of writing my own music.
After playing and teaching myself for years, I created my first album of 6 songs at about 14 years old. This album was never released to the public, only to my closest friends and family.
Now, years later, when my friend Brandon and I decided to make a video game, I had to start my largest project to date. This soundtrack is the first I have ever written, and I hope you love playing it as much as I loved writing it.
data.about_the_game:
From the composer:
At about 12 years old, I started playing the saxophone in my local middle-school band as part of their ‘Beginning Band’ program. Shortly after, I became fascinated with the idea of writing my own music.
After playing and teaching myself for years, I created my first album of 6 songs at about 14 years old. This album was never released to the public, only to my closest friends and family.
Now, years later, when my friend Brandon and I decided to make a video game, I had to start my largest project to date. This soundtrack is the first I have ever written, and I hope you love playing it as much as I loved writing it.
data.short_description: The original musical soundtrack to Lost Legend, written by hand by Adam Jo Noble, one of the developers of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 141 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 297 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lossless (high-quality) versions use FLAC file format. Must be able to play FLAC files to listen in HQ.

data.legal_notice:
Adam Jo Noble retains all rights to his music. Unhinged LLC posts his music here with his permission.
© Adam Jo Noble 2022
